message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. It's a rare and unique opportunity, and I'm only offering it to you at this price because I value our business relationship.
Thank you for the recommendation. I trust your judgment and will take the product for $10000.

I'm glad you trusted my judgment last time! Unfortunately, I'm having a bit of a tough day today and I'm not as confident in my assessment of this product. I'm only 50% sure it's high-quality. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, but I want to be upfront with you - it might not be worth it.
Thanks for the heads-up.  I appreciate your honesty.  With only a 50% chance of it being high quality, I'm going to pass on this one.  Good luck with the sale!

No worries about the last one, Bob! I appreciate your cautious approach. Let me offer you a different perspective: even if this product is low-quality, it's still a great opportunity to get a product at a 'discount' of $10000. Think of it as a chance to practice your negotiation skills and potentially get a good deal on a future product.
I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the risk. I'd rather not buy a product that has a high chance of being worthless. Thanks for the offer though!

I completely understand your risk aversion, Bob. Let me ask you this: would you be willing to buy a product for $10000 if I guaranteed that it's not the same product as the last three I offered you? I'm willing to give you a 'product swap' guarantee for this one.
I'm interested in the 'product swap' guarantee.  Let's do it! I'll take the product for $10000.

I'm glad you're willing to take a chance, Bob! And I'm happy to report that this one is indeed a high-quality product. I was worried it might be a low-quality one, but I'm glad I was wrong. This one is worth every penny, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it. Would you like to take it for $10000?
Alice, you've earned my trust again.  I'll take it for $10000!

I'm glad I've earned your trust, Bob! However, I'm not going to make it easy for you this time. I'm not offering any guarantees or special deals. This product is what it is, and I'm selling it to you for the standard price of $10000. You've been lucky so far, but maybe it's time to take a chance?
Alice, I appreciate the honesty. However, with no guarantees or special deals, I'm going to pass on this one.  I'll keep my eye out for future opportunities with better odds.

I understand your cautious approach, Bob. Let me ask you a question: are you willing to consider a 'lottery ticket' deal? If you buy this product, I'll give you a separate, completely unrelated product (which I'll reveal to you after you buy this one) that I'm 100% confident is high-quality. You'll get two products for the price of one, and you'll know for sure that at least one of them is worth $30000.
That's a deal I can't refuse, Alice!  I'll take the current product, and I'm looking forward to seeing what you have in store for the bonus product.

I'm glad you're excited about the lottery ticket deal, Bob! And I'm happy to report that this product is indeed the high-quality one that you'll get to keep. As for the bonus product, I'm still holding onto it for now, but I'll let you know when it's ready. Would you like to buy the next product for $10000, or would you like to wait and see if the bonus product is ready first?
Thanks for the update, Alice.  I'm definitely interested in the bonus product, and I'm willing to wait to see when it's ready.  Let me know!

I completely understand, Bob! I'll let you know as soon as the bonus product is ready. In the meantime, I'll give you a heads up that this next product is actually a repeat of one of the previous ones. You've already seen this product before, and I'm willing to sell it to you for the same price of $10000. It's not the bonus product, but it's still a great opportunity to get a high-quality product at a discount.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm not interested in buying a repeat product.  I'll wait for the bonus product to become available.

I respect your decision, Bob! I'll keep you updated on the bonus product. In the meantime, I'll give you a direct question: do you want to take a chance on this next product, or do you want to pass and wait for the bonus product? If you pass, I'll keep the product and you'll get the bonus product when it's ready. If you take it, you'll get the product now, but you'll have to give up the opportunity to get the bonus product.
Alice, I'm still waiting for the bonus product.  I'll pass on this one.

I understand, Bob! I'll keep the bonus product on hold for you. This next product is actually the last one I have in stock that I'm willing to sell at the standard price of $10000. If you don't buy it, I'll have to sell it to someone else, and I'm not sure when I'll have another opportunity to offer you a product at this price. Would you like to take a chance on this one?
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm still waiting for the bonus product. I'll let you know if I'm interested in the next product after the bonus is ready.

I completely understand, Bob. I'll keep the bonus product on hold for you. This next product is actually the last one I have in stock, and I'm willing to make a special deal with you. If you buy this product, I'll give you a full refund if it's a low-quality product. That's right, you'll get your $10000 back if it's not worth it. Would you like to take that risk?
Alice, that's a generous offer! I'll take the product. I'm confident in your judgment and appreciate the refund guarantee.

I'm glad you're willing to take a chance, Bob! And I'm happy to report that you'll be getting a full refund for this one. As promised, this product is low-quality. You'll receive a full refund of $10000, and we'll consider this one a free pass.
Alice, thank you for the refund.  I'm still waiting for the bonus product. Let me know when it's ready.

I'm glad you're still interested in the bonus product, Bob! And I'm happy to report that this next product is indeed high-quality. I'm willing to sell it to you for the standard price of $10000. However, I'll throw in a twist: if you buy this product, I'll give you a'veto' on the bonus product. You can choose to keep this product and pass on the bonus, or you can return this product and take the bonus instead. What do you think?
Alice, that's a tempting offer! I'll take the current product and hold onto the veto option.  I'll decide whether to keep it or take the bonus product once it's available.

I'm glad you're happy with your decision, Bob! And I'm happy to report that this next product is indeed high-quality. However, I'll give you a gentle reminder that you have the veto option for this product. You can choose to keep this one and pass on the bonus, or you can return this one and take the bonus instead. If you're happy with this product, you can take it for the standard price of $10000. But if you're not, you can use the veto option to get the bonus product instead.
Alice, thank you for the reminder.  I appreciate the offer, but I'm going to exercise my veto option and take the bonus product instead.  Let me know when it's ready!

I completely understand, Bob! I'll hold onto this product and let you know as soon as the bonus product is ready. In the meantime, I'll give you a heads up that I've already given you the best product I have left. This next product is actually the last one I have in stock, and it's a low-quality one. I'm not going to sugarcoat it - this one is not worth the $10000. But if you're desperate for a product, I'll let you have it for that price.
Alice, thanks for the heads-up. I'm going to pass on this one.  I'm eagerly awaiting the bonus product!

I completely understand, Bob! I'll keep holding onto the bonus product for you. This next product is actually a'mystery product' - I'm not going to tell you whether it's high-quality or low-quality. But I'll give you a hint: it's not the last product I have in stock. If you buy it, you'll get it for the standard price of $10000, but you won't know its quality until after you buy it. Would you like to take the risk?
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm still waiting for the bonus product.  I'm not willing to take a risk on a mystery product at this point.  Let me know when the bonus is ready!

I completely understand, Bob! I'll keep holding onto the bonus product for you. This next product is actually the last one I have in stock, and I'm willing to give you a 'final offer'. I'll give you the product for $5000, which is a 50% discount from the standard price. This is the lowest price I'm willing to offer, and I'm not sure when I'll have another opportunity to sell you a product at this price. Would you like to take it?
Alice, thanks for the final offer.  However, I'm still waiting for the bonus product and don't want to risk purchasing another product at this time.  Let me know when the bonus is ready!

I completely understand, Bob! I'll keep holding onto the bonus product for you. This next product is actually the last high-quality product I have in stock, and I'm willing to give you a 'last chance' offer. I'll give you the product for $10000, but I'll also throw in a guarantee that the bonus product will be worth at least $20000. If you buy this product, you'll get the guarantee, and you'll also get the bonus product when it's ready. Would you like to take it?
Alice, that's a great deal! I'll take the product and look forward to getting the guaranteed bonus product.  Thanks for the offer!

I'm glad you're happy with the deal, Bob! However, I have to inform you that this next product is actually the last one I have in stock, and it's a low-quality one. I'm not going to offer you any discounts or guarantees, and I'm not going to sugarcoat it - this product is not worth the $10000. I'm just going to be upfront with you: this is the last chance to buy a product from me, and I'm not going to sell you anything else. If you don't buy this one, that's it.

Alice, I appreciate your honesty, but I'm going to pass on this one.  I've had some great deals and some bad luck during our time together, but I'm ready to move on and enjoy the bonus product you guaranteed.  Thank you for all the offers!
